text:
Xealth | Software Engineer | Javascript / Node.js | Seattle | Onsite | https://xealth.io/

To apply: ed.pedini at xealth dot io

or: https://xealth.io/careers.html

Xealth enables healthcare teams to order digital content and services as easily as they do medications today. Patients can then access these digital health prescriptions from the provider's portal, so that they can actively manage their health. We just announced a partnership with Amazon, read it on Geekwire!
